name: Fourtex Zen
description:
Fourtex Zen is a match-4 game set in a Japanese garden with unique game mechanics. Play tactically in the moment or look ahead and play strategically.

Features
  • Successful play is rewarded along the way with rockin' classic poetry from Imperial-era Japanese poets
  • Earn achievements
  • Local leaderboards
  • Full controller and keyboard support on all platforms
  • Windowed or Fullscreen, portrait or landscape modes

Are you looking for something calming and relaxing? Try Fourtex Zen. No distractions. Turn off the score and turn up the sound and you're in your own zen garden.
